concept.title: Holiday Settings
concept.shortdesc: Holiday settings for the Hotel App.

conbody.p: Go to Hotel Settings Holiday to set the holiday settings for the hotel system.
The room price will automatically change to Holiday Price when the holiday comes. The hotel system supports to add holiday by date, by month or by week.

section.title: Set a Holiday by Date
section.p: If date of a holiday varies every year, you can set a holiday by date.

section.title: Set a Holiday by Month
section.p: If a holiday always falls on the same date, you can set a holiday by month.

section.title: Set a Holiday by Week
